data.title: Sunil Dutt: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Sunil Dutt: Check out the list of all Sunil Dutt movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Sunil Dutt news on Times of India.
data.text:
Did you know Manna Dey initially refused to sing the iconic song 'Ek Chatur Naar'

etimes.in / Jul 31, 2024, 21:18 (IST)

Manna Dey, the legendary Indian playback singer known for classics like 'Yeh Dosti', 'Zindagi Kaisi Hai Paheli', and 'Yeh Raat Bheegi Bheegi', initially refused to sing 'Ek Chatur Naar' from the 1968 film Padosan. Despite its global popularity today, Dey's initial hesitation stemmed from his discomfort with the song's humorous lyrics, which he felt clashed with his serious musical style. Padosan, featuring Sunil Dutt, Saira Banu, Kishore Kumar, and Om Prakash, is celebrated for its stellar performances and memorable soundtrack. Although some lyrics were adjusted, Dey remained uneasy about the portions sung by Kishore Kumar. However, the song became a timeless hit, showcasing the lasting appeal of both singers. Born Prabodh Chandra Dey in 1919 in Kolkata, Dey pursued a music career despite his father's wish for him to become a lawyer. Encouraged by his uncle Krishnachandra Dey and Ustad Dabir Khan, he achieved great success. Manna Dey passed away on October 24, 2013, at 94.

Golden Days: When Sunil Duttâ€™s selfless love and courage saved Nargis from fire

etimes.in / Jun 30, 2024, 17:31 (IST)

Nargis, an iconic figure in Indian cinema, is celebrated for her exceptional talent and beauty. Despite her flourishing career, her personal life was marked by turbulence, particularly due to her complex relationship with Raj Kapoor. Her true love story began when Sunil Dutt heroically saved her from a fire on the set of 'Mother India,' igniting a romance that would become legendary.

Throwback: When Sanjay Dutt opened up on his battle with drugs describing it as "nine years of hell"

etimes.in / Jul 29, 2024, 07:45 (IST)

The turning point came when he woke up after a two-day drug binge, feeling disoriented and hungry. His servant's tears upon seeing him revealed the extent of concern from those around him. "You have woken up after two days. The house has gone crazy, people are worried," the servant said, prompting Dutt to confront the reality of his situation.

Sanjay Dutt REVEALS his birthday plans and it includes a loving tribute to mom Nargis's timeless comfort foods - Deets inside

etimes.in / Jul 29, 2024, 01:45 (IST)

Sanjay Dutt has revealed his birthday plans will be a cozy family affair, reflecting on past star-studded celebrations. He shared his love for his late mother Nargis's comfort foods and praised the Chicken Sanju Baba named after him. After a lung cancer diagnosis in 2020, Dutt now follows a balanced diet with occasional indulgences.

When Sanjay Dutt admitted missing his father late actor Sunil Dutt, stated 'He would have undoubtedly been overjoyed to witness my freedom"

etimes.in / Jun 06, 2024, 18:14 (IST)

Sanjay Dutt, a renowned Bollywood actor, has faced numerous controversies throughout his life, including his implication in the 1993 Mumbai serial blasts and accusations of possessing ammunition. After a prolonged legal battle, Dutt was sentenced to five years in prison in 2013. Reflecting on his release, Sanjay expressed disbelief at being free after 23 years, feeling as if he were still on parole. He admitted missing his late father, Sunil Dutt, who would have been overjoyed to see his son's freedom. Sanjay revealed that his father's unwavering support throughout the ordeal stemmed from a singular desire: to see him liberated.

On Sunil Dutt's Birth Anniversary, Saira Banu shares some throwback pics, pens heartfelt note

Jun 06, 2024, 14:38 (IST)

Along with the pic, she wrote, "Dilip Sahib and Dutt Sahab shared a friendship that was more like family. They were always there for each other through thick and thin. Whenever one of them faced a challenge, the other was right by his side, offering support and encouragement. Despite their iconic status and luxurious lives, Dilip Sahib and Dutt Sahab never turned a blind eye to the struggles of their fellow members in the film fraternity"

Golden Days: Sunil Dutt's journey from a bus conductor to Bollywood superstar and beyond

etimes.in / Jun 06, 2024, 13:23 (IST)

Sunil Dutt's remarkable journey from a bus conductor to a Bollywood superstar is a testament to his resilience and talent. His career, marked by iconic films and a foray into politics, highlights his multifaceted contributions to Indian cinema and society. Dutt's enduring legacy continues to inspire, reflecting his profound impact on both the entertainment industry and public life.

Sanjay Dutt pays tribute to mom Nargis on birth anniversary with unseen pics and emotional note, 'I hope I have made you proud'

etimes.in / Jun 01, 2024, 13:39 (IST)

Sanjay Dutt often reminisces about his parents on social media, sharing cherished memories and expressing his deep longing for them. On Nargis Dutt's birth anniversary, he posted photos with heartfelt captions, expressing his love and longing for her presence. Recently, on the anniversary of Sunil Dutt's passing, Sanjay shared poignant images, honoring his father's memory and his enduring influence in his life. In his professional life, Sanjay has appeared in the 2023 Tamil film 'Leo' and featured in 'Shamshera' and 'KGF Chapter 2'. Upcoming projects include 'iSmart Shankar' in Telugu, 'Sheran Di Kaum Punjabi' in Punjabi, and 'Baap' helmed by Vivek Chauhan. Through his personal and professional endeavors, Sanjay Dutt continues to honor his parents' legacy while making significant contributions to the entertainment industry.

Mother's Day: Sanjay Dutt wishes mom Nargis Dutt

etimes.in / May 12, 2024, 12:32 (IST)

Sanjay Dutt honored his late mother, Nargis Dutt, on Mother's Day, thanking her for teaching him unconditional love and kindness. Nargis couldn't witness Sanjay's debut film due to her battle with pancreatic cancer. Sanjay, known for his iconic roles, is currently filming "Welcome to the Jungle" after the success of "Leo: Bloody Sweet."

Sanjay Dutt remembers Mother Nargis on her death anniversary with heartwarming photos

etimes.in / May 03, 2024, 13:58 (IST)

On the 43rd death anniversary of Nargis Dutt, Sanjay Dutt shared poignant photos and a heartfelt note, remembering his mother. He expressed his profound love and how her absence is deeply felt in every moment. Nargis, who passed away from pancreatic cancer in 1981, had a significant impact on Sanjay's life and career, notably during the release of his debut film 'Rocky', just days after her demise. Sanjay's latest appearance was in the Tamil film 'Leo' alongside Thalapathy Vijay. Upcoming projects include the third installment of the 'Welcome' franchise, 'Welcome to the Jungle', and a comedy venture helmed by Raaj Shaandilyaa. Sanjay's tribute to his mother reflects the enduring bond they shared, resonating with fans who continue to cherish Nargis's legacy in Indian cinema.

Sanjay Dutt wishes late father Sunil Dutt a Happy Birthday with heartfelt post: see inside

Jun 06, 2024, 11:56 (IST)

The subsequent photo depicted a candid moment of the legendary actor engrossed in reading a letter. Alongside the heartfelt images, the "Agneepath" actor penned a touching tribute to his father on his birthday, expressing, "Happy birthday dad, I miss you and love you, I have and will follow all that you have taught me, the values, and most of all to be a humble and a good human being who helps the needy, love you dad."

Sanjay Dutt clarifies he is NOT joining politics, urges fans to not believe rumours

etimes.in / Apr 08, 2024, 15:11 (IST)

Sanjay Dutt steers clear on the rumours of him contesting elections from Haryana. The actor said if he ever decides to join politics, he will be the first one to announce it!

Sanjay Dutt's sister Priya Dutt pays tribute to parents Sunil and Nargis Dutt on Valentine's Day: 'Their love wasn't just a story...'

etimes.in / Feb 14, 2024, 20:46 (IST)

On Valentine's Day, Priya Dutt paid homage to her late parents Sunil and Nargis Dutt by sharing a priceless throwback photo and a heartfelt message about their extraordinary fairy tale love story. Their devotion endured turbulence, making them companions. As soon as she shared the post, fans and friends showered love in the comment section.
